img_above_text:
![Wukong Snowhill 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/3/39/Wukong_Snowhill_9.jpg)
You can head past the small building the other monkey was perched on, or swing around the back side to find a small alternate path. This area leads up to a large column with a green Wisp you can absorb, and two Frozen Corpses guarding it.
img_below_text:
Head back up the main path through more Frozen Corpses, taking them on one at a time so you don't get overwhelmed. Once you reach the top of this area you'll find a large snowy field where the monkey is waiting for you.
### Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)

You can head past the small building the other monkey was perched on, or swing around the back side to find a small alternate path. This area leads up to a large column with a green Wisp you can absorb, and two Frozen Corpses guarding it."
        - Following Text: "Head back up the main path through more Frozen Corpses, taking them on one at a time so you don't get overwhelmed. Once you reach the top of this area you'll find a large snowy field where the monkey is waiting for you.
### Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the video game "Black Myth: Wukong," where the player character, resembling a monkey, is navigating a snowy landscape. The character is approaching a group of enemies known as Frozen Corpses, which are guarding a path. This area is part of the journey towards a large snowy field where a significant encounter with the Yaoguai Chief, Macaque Chief, is anticipated. The image illustrates the strategic approach needed to tackle the enemies one at a time to avoid being overwhelmed.
